data.text: Ethereum's Vitalik Buterin has offered two thought experiments on how to establish whether an algorithmic (algo) stablecoin is feasible in the long term. On 25 May, Buterin remarked that increased examination of crypto and DeFi in the aftermath of Terra's meltdown is “really beneficial.

data.title: Bears Control Brings Bitcoin (BTC) Break Key Support levels Raising Concerns
data.text: Bitcoin's decline, according to JPMorgan, seems to be a sign of surrender. Support at $28,630 was a crucial support level
